author: tomaz
msg: Add homebrew curl-ca-bundle path to CA_CERTS_PATH. This will make Libcloud
use homebrew curl ca bundle file (if available) for server certificate
Contributed by Robert Chiniquy, part of LIBCLOUD-324.
